Control.Name: BarsManagers_Health_bPourcentWith2Digits
Control.Text: Display pourcent with 2 digits after comma

Control.Name: DrawManagers_SimpleLine_bEnabled
Control.Text: Enable line from 1 coordinate, mostly used for cleaves.

Control.Name: DrawManagers_LineBetween_bEnabled
Control.Text: Enable line with 2 coordinates. By example, between a player and a foe.

Pixie.Text: A coordinate can be static (attached to the ground) or dynamic (attached to an unit).
The result on the CPU load will not be the same.

Control.Name: bAcceptSummons
Control.Text: Accept summon requests from raid leaders and assistants

Control.Name: bReadyCheckOnBreakTimeout
Control.Text: Start a "ready check" on break timeout

Control.Name: bDisableSelectiveTracking
Control.Text: Disable selective tracking for debugging and encounter creation purposes.

Pixie.Text: - The addon was originally made by Ninjouz of Eugenic, then continue by Kami Nuvini and now by Immé sama.
- On version 3.x, 85% of RaidCore have been rewritten by Immé sama (Also author of DruseraBossMod).
- On version 4.x, the draw manager is recoded for much more performance and features.
- On version 5.x, new GUI more attractive.
- On version 6.x, picked up and continued by Zod, Jenza and Zeffuro from <Cupcakes> for RMT and performance optimizations.

Control.Name: Encounters_PrimeEvolutionaryOperant_LinesOnBosses
